name: Game birds, declaration by department
text:
PART III.  GAME BIRDS

     (a)  The department may declare, by rule adopted pursuant to chapter 91, any bird which has been or may be introduced into the State to be propagated for hunting purposes, to be a game bird within the meaning of this chapter.
	(b)  Nothing in this section shall be construed as permitting the taking, stalking, pursuing, or killing of any game bird under domestication or in the legal possession or control of any person, or where otherwise prohibited by law or rule of the department. [L 1985, c 174, pt of §4]
